# Simulations

```{r simulations}
library(ggplot2)

means <- NULL
sims <- 1000; n <- 40; lambda = 0.2

for (i in 1:sims) means <- c(means, mean(rexp(n,lambda)))

ggplot(as.data.frame(means), aes(x = means)) +
    geom_histogram()

```
